title: Fix the game.
body:
So Riot, if you're going to start a ranked season, could you please make sure your ratshit client isn't filled with bugs that are going to cause my game to crash every second placement match I have?

That would be real nice, so that maybe I have some chance of not ending up in Bronze because your QA team is useless.

Thanks.

replies.body: Fix the game? Your attitude is the thing that needs fixing, mister! {{champion:39}}

How many times do u need to be told?
If you are bronze, you are there because you are doing something wrong, or just in general a really really bad player. 
Focus on yourself, and accept u are a bad.

Repair or worst case, Reinstall.

Turn off peer to peer if you haven't already.
